meanings.definition: A grinding tooth at the back of a mammal's mouth.
meanings.sent2: She used her molars to grind the nuts.
meanings.sent3: The molars had a party with the incisors.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the grip of molars.
meanings.sent5: The molars, like tiny grinders, crushed the seeds effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A large, flat tooth at the back of the mouth used for grinding food.
meanings.sent1: My molars are at the back of my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist checked her molars for cavities.
meanings.sent3: The molars were on a mission to crush the cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as her healthy molars.
meanings.sent5: The molars worked tirelessly to break down the tough meat.
